alert.note: Alert for Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 6:43AM AKST until January 13 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, with periods of blizzard conditions and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Ice will cover many surfaces. Power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions may improve briefly this afternoon, but heavy snow will resume tonight. There will be periods of freezing rain through Saturday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
